<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** ‚Ä¢ Edit file: src/pages/Overview/LicenseUtilizationTile.jsx</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 216, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,216 @@
- 
+ import {
+   Chart as ChartJS,
+   CategoryScale,
+   LinearScale,
+   BarElement,
+   LineElement,
+   PointElement,
+   Title,
+   Tooltip,
+   Legend
+ } from &#39;chart.js&#39;;
+ import { Chart } from &#39;react-chartjs-2&#39;;
+ import Card, { CardHeader } from &#39;../../components/ui/Card&#39;;
+ import { licenseUtilizationData } from &#39;../../data/licenseUtilizationData&#39;;
+ import styles from &#39;../../styles/components/LicenseUtilizationTile.module.css&#39;;
+ 
+ ChartJS.register(
+   CategoryScale,
+   LinearScale,
+   BarElement,
+   LineElement,
+   PointElement,
+   Title,
+   Tooltip,
+   Legend
+ );
+ 
+ const LicenseUtilizationTile = () =&gt; {
+   // Process data for chart
+   const labels = licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; d.name);
+   
+   const currentUtilization = licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; (d.used / d.contracted) * 100);
+   const unusedPercent = licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; ((d.contracted - d.used) / d.contracted) * 100);
+   const forecastUtilization = licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; d.forecastPercent);
+ 
+   // Map actions to colors
+   const getActionColor = (action) =&gt; {
+     switch(action) {
+       case &#39;upsell&#39;: return &#39;#bb0000&#39;; // sapNegativeColor
+       case &#39;reduce&#39;: return &#39;#107e3e&#39;; // sapPositiveColor
+       default: return &#39;#e9730c&#39;; // sapCriticalColor
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const data = {
+     labels,
+     datasets: [
+       {
+         label: &#39;Used Licenses&#39;,
+         data: currentUtilization,
+         backgroundColor: &#39;#0070f2&#39;,
+         borderRadius: 4,
+         stack: &#39;current&#39;,
+         order: 2
+       },
+       {
+         label: &#39;Unused Licenses&#39;,
+         data: unusedPercent,
+         backgroundColor: &#39;#ffcdd2&#39;, // Light red for waste visualization
+         borderRadius: 4,
+         stack: &#39;current&#39;,
+         order: 3
+       },
+       {
+         label: &#39;Forecast at Renewal&#39;,
+         data: forecastUtilization,
+         type: &#39;line&#39;,
+         backgroundColor: &#39;transparent&#39;,
+         borderColor: licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; getActionColor(d.action)),
+         borderWidth: 0, // We only want points/icons, not the line connecting them
+         pointRadius: 8,
+         pointHoverRadius: 10,
+         pointStyle: &#39;circle&#39;,
+         pointBackgroundColor: licenseUtilizationData.map(d =&gt; getActionColor(d.action)),
+         pointBorderColor: &#39;#fff&#39;,
+         pointBorderWidth: 2,
+         order: 1
+       }
+     ]
+   };
+ 
+   const options = {
+     indexAxis: &#39;y&#39;,
+     responsive: true,
+     maintainAspectRatio: false,
+     plugins: {
+       legend: {
+         display: true,
+         position: &#39;bottom&#39;,
+         labels: {
+           padding: 15,
+           font: { size: 12 },
+           usePointStyle: true,
+           filter: (item) =&gt; item.text !== &#39;Forecast at Renewal&#39; // Hide the complex line legend, we explain it below
+         }
+       },
+       tooltip: {
+         callbacks: {
+           label: (context) =&gt; {
+             const dataIndex = context.dataIndex;
+             const product = licenseUtilizationData[dataIndex];
+             const datasetLabel = context.dataset.label;
+ 
+             if (datasetLabel === &#39;Forecast at Renewal&#39;) {
+               return [
+                 &#96;Forecast: ${product.forecastPercent}% utilization&#96;,
+                 &#96;Recommended: ${Math.round(product.contracted * (product.forecastPercent / 100))} licenses&#96;,
+                 &#96;Renewal in: ${product.daysUntilRenewal} days&#96;
+               ];
+             } else if (datasetLabel === &#39;Used Licenses&#39;) {
+               return &#96;Used: ${product.used} / ${product.contracted} (${Math.round((product.used/product.contracted)*100)}%)&#96;;
+             }
+             return &#96;Unused: ${product.contracted - product.used} licenses&#96;;
+           }
+         }
+       }
+     },
+     scales: {
+       x: {
+         stacked: true,
+         min: 0,
+         max: 150, // Allow space for forecast &gt; 100%
+         ticks: {
+           callback: (value) =&gt; value + &#39;%&#39;,
+           stepSize: 25
+         },
+         grid: {
+           color: (context) =&gt; context.tick.value === 100 ? &#39;#e9730c&#39; : &#39;rgba(0,0,0,0.1)&#39;,
+           lineWidth: (context) =&gt; context.tick.value === 100 ? 2 : 1
+         }
+       },
+       y: {
+         stacked: true,
+         grid: { display: false }
+       }
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Custom plugin to draw icons and text
+   const forecastAnnotations = {
+     id: &#39;forecastAnnotations&#39;,
+     afterDatasetsDraw: (chart) =&gt; {
+       const { ctx, scales: { x: xAxis, y: yAxis } } = chart;
+       
+       chart.data.datasets[2].data.forEach((value, index) =&gt; {
+         const product = licenseUtilizationData[index];
+         const y = yAxis.getPixelForValue(index);
+         const xPos = xAxis.getPixelForValue(value);
+         
+         // Draw icon based on action
+         let icon = &#39;üü°&#39;;
+         if (product.action === &#39;upsell&#39;) icon = &#39;üî¥&#39;;
+         if (product.action === &#39;reduce&#39;) icon = &#39;üü¢&#39;;
+ 
+         ctx.font = &#39;16px Arial&#39;;
+         ctx.textAlign = &#39;center&#39;;
+         ctx.textBaseline = &#39;middle&#39;;
+         ctx.fillText(icon, xPos, y);
+ 
+         // Draw percentage text
+         ctx.font = &#39;bold 10px Arial&#39;;
+         ctx.fillStyle = getActionColor(product.action);
+         ctx.fillText(&#96;${value}%&#96;, xPos, y + 15);
+       });
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Card&gt;
+       &lt;CardHeader 
+         title=&quot;License Utilization &amp; Forecast&quot; 
+         subtitle=&quot;Portfolio view with renewal recommendations&quot;
+       /&gt;
+       &lt;div className={styles.container}&gt;
+         &lt;div className={styles.chartContainer}&gt;
+           &lt;Chart 
+             type=&quot;bar&quot; 
+             data={data} 
+             options={options} 
+             plugins={[forecastAnnotations]}
+           /&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div className={styles.legendGrid}&gt;
+           {licenseUtilizationData.map((product) =&gt; (
+             &lt;div 
+               key={product.name} 
+               className={&#96;${styles.legendItem} ${styles[&#96;action-${product.action}&#96;]}&#96;}
+             &gt;
+               &lt;div className={styles.icon}&gt;
+                 {product.action === &#39;upsell&#39; ? &#39;üî¥&#39; : product.action === &#39;reduce&#39; ? &#39;üü¢&#39; : &#39;üü°&#39;}
+               &lt;/div&gt;
+               &lt;div className={styles.content}&gt;
+                 &lt;div className={styles.productName}&gt;{product.name}&lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;div className={styles.recommendation}&gt;
+                   Current: {product.used} ({Math.round((product.used/product.contracted)*100)}%)
+                   &lt;span className={styles.forecastValue}&gt;
+                     Forecast: {product.forecastPercent}% of contract
+                   &lt;/span&gt;
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;div className={styles.actionBadge}&gt;
+                   {product.action === &#39;upsell&#39; ? &#39;‚ö†Ô∏è UPSELL REQUIRED&#39; : 
+                    product.action === &#39;reduce&#39; ? &#39;‚úì REDUCE AT RENEWAL&#39; : 
+                    &#39;‚è± MONITOR&#39;}
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+               &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+           ))}
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/Card&gt;
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default LicenseUtilizationTile;
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

### Summary of Changes

1.  **Data Module**: Created `src/data/licenseUtilizationData.js` with the services from your project (SAP HANA Cloud, SAP AI Launchpad, Cloud Foundry Runtime, etc.), enriched with utilization and forecast data.

    *   A horizontal bar chart using `chart.js` with custom annotations for forecast icons (üî¥, üü¢, üü°).
    *   A detailed legend below the chart showing recommendations and actions (Upsell, Reduce, Monitor).
3.  **Styles**: Created `src/styles/components/LicenseUtilizationTile.module.css` to match the look and feel of the provided HTML reference, using SAP standard colors.
4.  **Layout**: Updated `src/styles/pages/Overview.module.css` to set the bottom grid to `1fr 1fr`, ensuring the new tile takes 50% of the width.
5.  **Integration**: Replaced `ForecastBreakdown` with `LicenseUtilizationTile` in `src/pages/Overview/index.jsx`.

1.  **Service Names**: Updated `src/data/licenseUtilizationData.js` to use "Signavio", "SaSM", "PaPM", and "SAC".

---

I have updated the icons inside the chart canvas to match the SAP icons used in the legend:

*   **Upsell**: Now uses the warning triangle icon (`\uf071` / `fa-triangle-exclamation`) instead of the red circle emoji.
*   **Reduce**: Now uses the check mark icon (`\uf00c` / `fa-check`) instead of the green circle emoji.
*   **Monitor**: Now uses the half-stroke circle icon (`\uf5c0` / `fa-circle-half-stroke`) instead of the yellow circle emoji.

These icons now align with the `warning`, `accept`, and `status-in-process` icons used in the list below the chart.
